meanings.sent1: The biradial pattern on the flower petals was truly unique.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a biradial design using different colored lines.
meanings.sent3: The biradial arrangement of chairs in the waiting room made it look like a flower.
meanings.sent4: Her biradial thinking allowed her to see things from multiple perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The biradial shape of the snowflake was mesmerizing to behold.

meanings.definition: Having two planes of symmetry at right angles to each other.
meanings.sent1: The biradial crystal had perfectly balanced sides.
meanings.sent2: The biradial mirror reflected the room in a unique way.
meanings.sent3: The biradial cake was cut into equal halves along both axes.
meanings.sent4: His biradial approach to problem-solving always led to elegant solutions.
meanings.sent5: The biradial wings of the butterfly created a stunning visual effect.
